Intro: Senior Frontend Engineer with a seven-year track record in tech, spearheading UI for a leading healthcare analytics platform, adept in Angular, Javascript, Java, Python, Data Engineering, and AWS Cloud Engineering. At a Fortune 5 company, I’m driving provider and payer analytics, aiming to transition to a Senior UI/UX Engineer role to create engaging and user-centric experiences.

Also, I created the main UX/UI for the new site and helped with the deployment to On-Premise (IIS) and AWS clients.

Integration of a payment gateway (Kushki) on a Net Core WebApi and Vue.js frontend.
Teaching Vue.js, Python, Java and SQL fundamentals to some beneficiaries of MinTic's program Mision Tic, whose could help to close digital divide in Colombia.
